title: These are the newest iPhone MagSafe cases and Apple Watch bands for spring
content:
Following today’s Apple event, all-new MagSafe iPhone cases have been made available to order on the Apple Store – this new Spring collection includes a wide variety of tones for Apple’s silicone cases. The company also debuted new colors for Apple Watch bands.

more…

The post These are the newest iPhone MagSafe cases and Apple Watch bands for spring appeared first on 9to5Mac.
